act: OFFICE OF THE SPOUSE OF THE PRESIDENT ACT

type.name: section
type.title: Office of the Spouse of the President.
type.context: OFFICE OF THE SPOUSE OF THE PRESIDENT ACT under Office of the Spouse of the President. 2. (1) There shall be a public office called the Office of the Spouse of the President:  Provided that where the office is held by a woman, it shall be called the Office of the First Lady.  (2) The Office of the Spouse of the President shall be held by the spouse of a serving President and its tenure shall be co- terminus with that of the serving President.
